learning.title: Time Pressure, Deadlines, and Process Control

questions.promptMd: Which move MOST effectively mitigates artificial deadline pressure?

answers.contentMd: Ask for the rationale behind the date and propose a brief, milestone‑tied extension
answers.feedbackMd: Tests legitimacy and protects decision quality.

answers.contentMd: Concede quickly to avoid missing the date
Debate louder to win the point

questions.promptMd: Which process shift reduces heat and improves clarity mid‑negotiation?

answers.contentMd: Move contentious points to async email with a recap and options
Remove the agenda to be flexible

questions.promptMd: True or False: Batching issues and resolving them as packages helps prevent whack‑a‑mole under time pressure.

answers.feedbackMd: Correct. Packages preserve trades and focus.
